title: Dinnerbone：新的按键设置菜单
author: seraph0012
txt_content:
本帖最后由 seraph0012 于 2013-8-1 11:55 编辑 

Nathan Adams‏@Dinnerbone
觉得关于新版本的更新消息太少了吗？别担心。我会满足你们的。（Too few minecraft update spoilers lately? Don't worry guys, I have control over the situation ）


我们可以看到，新的菜单中包括截图、视角等功能键都可以自定义设置了。

replies.author: dcsuibian
replies.txt_content: 辛苦了LZ

replies.author: a18964819868
replies.txt_content: 哇哦，表示很新奇，笑~
板凳……看木懂。。

replies.author: xiaobaicai
replies.txt_content: 不错哟

replies.author: d2dsystem
replies.txt_content: 随便吧。。。其实都没关系

replies.author: 缘翼柒枫
replies.txt_content: 我特别想问能设置123456789就好了按6789好累。

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 没啥意思。。

replies.author: Leo_cool
replies.txt_content: 不错啊，都可以自定义了
0.0+【看来以后F几的那些按键也可以设置了咩~~~

replies.author: 天真的老菊花
replies.txt_content: 新东西看不懂。但是感觉会很高级的样子。

replies.author: a20001017
replies.txt_content: 刚刚要发就看见这个贴233

replies.author: minehenry
replies.txt_content: 感觉没啥用 操作都习惯了的 改也不适应

replies.author: ckj
replies.txt_content: 你不能改成中文给我们看么？

replies.author: sweetapple
replies.txt_content: 这个更新不错。更人性化了。

replies.author: walle
replies.txt_content: 感觉这个功能没什么意义...估计除非键盘坏了 不然都是懒得去改..

replies.author: Terry39
replies.txt_content:
40252492 发表于 2013-8-1 12:14 
0.0+【看来以后F几的那些按键也可以设置了咩~~~
表示我的电脑F几都摁不起来

replies.author: zhouyiran2
replies.txt_content: 觉得这里应该做成一个TabControl的样式

replies.author: 我是基岩
replies.txt_content: 表示英文看不懂。
